      • onBindViewHolder

        public void onBindViewHolder(@NonNull
                             StatisticsFragment.StatsAdapter.ViewHolder holder,
                             int position)
        Called by RecyclerView to display the data at the specified position. This method updates the contents of the RecyclerView.ViewHolder.itemView to reflect the item at the given position.
        Specified by:
        onBindViewHolder in class RecyclerView.Adapter<StatisticsFragment.StatsAdapter.ViewHolder>
        Parameters:
        holder - the StatisticsFragment.StatsAdapter.ViewHolder which should be updated to represent the contents of the item at the given position in the data set.
        position - the position of the item within the adapter's data set.
